description:
The bodyguard of Jinzhou’s Magistrate, known for having an icy personality.
Once regarded as the Asura of Calamity, Sanhua is now a taciturn guardian. She has learned to maintain inner calmness amidst the chaotic frequencies, and the things that once frightened her now fuel her determination.

skills.name: Frigid Light
skills.description: Basic Attack Sanhua performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG. Heavy Attack Sanhua consumes STA to launch attacks, dealing Glacio DMG. Mid-air Attack Sanhua consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

skills.name: Eternal Frost
skills.description: Sanhua sends an air blade to create 1 "Ice Prism" on the ground, dealing Glacio DMG.

skills.name: Glacial Gaze
skills.description: Sanhua deals Glacio DMG and creates 1 "Glacier".

skills.name: Condensation
skills.description: Damage dealt by Sanhua's Resonance Skill increased by 20% for 8s after casting her Intro Skill.

skills.name: Avalanche
skills.description: Damage dealt by Sanhua's Forte Circuit Ice Burst is increased by 20% for 8s after casting Basic Attack 5.

skills.name: Freezing Thorns
skills.description: Sanhua swings her blade downward and creates 1 "Ice Thorn", dealing Glacio DMG.

skills.name: Clarity of Mind
skills.description: Heavy Attack: Detonate When holding Basic Attack, a cursor moves back and forth on the Forte Gauge. Release Basic Attack while cursor falls in the "Frostbite" area, to perform Heavy Attack Detonate, dealing Glacio DMG considered as Heavy Attack damage. Ice Burst Sanhua’s Heavy Attack Detonate detonates all "Ice Thorns", "Ice Prisms" and "Glaciers" within her attack range, dealing Glacio DMG. DMG done by Ice Burst is considered as Resonance Skill damage. Frostbite Area The "Frostbite" area expands with every 1 stack of "Clarity". "Clarity" stacks up to 2 times. Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon performing Basic Attack 5. Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon casting Intro Skill Freezing Thorns. Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon casting Resonance Skill Eternal Frost. Sanhua obtains 2 stack(s) of "Clarity" upon casting Resonance Liberation Glacial Gaze. Upon casting Heavy Attack Detonate, all "Clarity" is removed.

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

resonanceChain.name: Solitude's Embrace
resonanceChain.description: Basic Attack V increases Sanhua's Crit. Rate by {0} for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Snowy Clarity
resonanceChain.description: Stamina cost of Heavy Attack Detonate is reduced by {0}. When Sanhua casts Resonance Skill Eternal Frost, her Anti-interruption is enhanced for {0}s.

resonanceChain.name: Anomalous Vision
resonanceChain.description: Sanhua's damage dealt is increased by {1} against targets with HP below {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Blade Mastery
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Liberation Glacial Gaze restores {0} Resonance Energy. DMG of the next Heavy Attack Detonate within {1}s is increased by {2}.

resonanceChain.name: Unraveling Fate
resonanceChain.description: Crit. DMG of Forte Circuit Ice Burst is increased by {0}. Ice Creations (Ice Thorn, Ice Prism, and Glacier) will explode even if they are not detonated.

resonanceChain.name: Daybreak Radiance
resonanceChain.description: After an Ice Prism or a Glacier is detonated, all team members' ATK is increased by {0} for {1}s, stacking up to {2} times.

quote: Please don't stay too far away from me. I am confident to not let you get harmed in the slightest.
